title: Capturing electronic patient reported outcomes in oncology practice. - ASCO Publications

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 67% of patients completed assessments with auto-reminders, halving discontinuation risk.
**TACTICAL WIN [ROADMAP]**: Develop AI-driven patient prioritization to optimize reminder timing.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸŸ¡ NOTABLE]**: Growing adoption trend shows PROs improving trial success rates by 25%.
**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias may skew results toward healthier patients, impacting clinical validity.
